name: Cradily

passive.name: Swaying Strangle
passive.effect: If the Defending Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, it cannot retreat.

attacks.name: Evolutionary Call
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Pokemon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Harsh Acid
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If Heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If Tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

flavor: These Pokemon hunted ferociously in their time. It was an ice age that finally killed them, but foolish scientists reintroduced them in the 90s.
